name: test_NAF_8_7_0_Upload_Video_With_Unpublished_Status
description:
Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Video section
4. Upload a new video with random title
5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
6. Verify video appears in the videos list
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Video section
  4. Upload a new video with random title
  5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
  6. Verify video appears in the videos list

@allure.feature("8.0.0 CMS Video Management")
    @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing")
    @allure.story("8.7.0 Upload Video - Unpublished Status")
    @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.CRITICAL)
    @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-157", name="Qase: NAF-157")
    @allure.link("https://app.qase.io/case/NAF-160", name="Qase: NAF-160")
    @allure.description("""
    Test that an admin user can upload a new video to the platform with unpublished status.
    
    Test Steps:
    1. Launch the browser
    2. Login as admin user
    3. Navigate to Video section
    4. Upload a new video with random title
    5. Verify video is uploaded with unpublished status
    6. Verify video appears in the videos list
    """)
    def test_NAF_8_7_0_Upload_Video_With_Unpublished_Status():
    
            with LambdaTestBrowser(test_name="test_8_7_0_Upload_Video_With_Unpublished_Status") as page:
    
                #Go to login
                login_page = LoginPage(page)
                login_page.loginDev(admin_user,admin_pw)
    
                #Go to Videos
                videos_page = VideosPage(page)
                assert videos_page.navigate_to_videos()
    
                #Upload Video
                video_title = create_video_title()
